title: Yellowstone
description: A ranching family in Montana faces off against others encroaching on their land.
Follows the Dutton family as they embark on a journey west.

title: Walker: Independence
description: Abby Walker's husband is murdered before her eyes. On her quest for revenge, Abby crosses paths with Hoyt Rawlins. Abby and Hoyt's journey takes them to Independence, Texas, where they encounter residents running from their own pasts.

title: Justified
description: U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal mining towns of eastern Kentucky.

title: Walker
description: A widowed father returns to Austin after one year, attempting to reconnect with his children, navigate clashes with his family, and find common ground with his new partner, while growing increasingly suspicious of his wife's death.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
description: Members of the Osage tribe in the United States are murdered under mysterious circumstances in the 1920s sparking a major F.B.I. investigation involving J. Edgar Hoover.

title: Gunsmoke
description: Marshal Matt Dillon keeps the peace in rough-and-tumble Dodge City.

title: Django Unchained
description: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

The next chapter of the Yellowstone origin story is ordered. Produced by MTV Entertainment Studios and 101 Studios, 1923 will follow a new generation of Duttons during the time of Western expansion, Prohibition and the Great Depression.

title: Deadwood
description: A show set in the late 1800s, revolving around the characters of Deadwood, South Dakota; a town of deep corruption and crime.

title: Little House on the Prairie
description: The life and adventures of the Ingalls family in the nineteenth century American Midwest.

title: Longmire
description: Walt Longmire is the dedicated and unflappable sheriff of Absaroka County, Wyoming. Widowed only a year, he is a man in psychic repair but buries his pain behind his brave face, unassuming grin and dry wit.

title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
description: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

title: Tombstone
description: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: City Slickers
description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

title: The Power of the Dog
description: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

title: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: The Harder They Fall
description: When an outlaw discovers his enemy is being released from prison, he reunites his gang to seek revenge.

title: The Devil's Rejects
description: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.

title: The Ranch
description: The son of a Colorado rancher returns home from a semi-pro football career to run the family business.

title: Blazing Saddles
description: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

title: Dr. Quinn, Medicine Woman
description: The trials and adventures of a female doctor in a small Wild West town.

title: Legends of the Fall
description: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

title: Bone Tomahawk
description: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

title: Wind River
description: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

title: Wagon Train
description: Stories of the journeys of a wagon train as it leaves post-Civil War Missouri on its way to California through the plains, deserts, and Rocky Mountains.

title: Godless
description: In the 1880s American West, murderous outlaw gang leader Frank Griffin hunts for ex-protege Roy Goode. Frank's chase leads him to La Belle, New Mexico--a town inhabited, after a mining disaster, almost entirely by women.

title: Hostiles
description: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

title: Once Upon a Time in the West
description: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

title: Unforgiven
description: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

title: Hell or High Water
description: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

title: The English
description: Follows a woman as she seeks revenge on the man she sees as responsible for the death of her son.

title: Bonanza
description: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

title: Wyatt Earp
description: From Wichita to Dodge City, to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure, and desperate heroic action.

title: Cowboys & Aliens
description: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

title: True Grit
description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

title: Old Henry
description: An action western about a farmer who takes in an injured man with a satchel of cash. When a posse comes for the money, he must decide who to trust. Defending a siege, he reveals a gunslinging talent calling his true identity into question.

title: Dead for a Dollar
description: A famed bounty hunter runs into his sworn enemy, a professional gambler and outlaw that he had sent to prison years before.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
description: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

title: The Virginian
description: Personable Western series based in Wyoming from the 1890s onward.

title: Almost Heroes
description: Two bumbling explorers hope to beat Lewis & Clarke to the Pacific Ocean as they race across America's western frontier in the early 1800's.

title: The Magnificent Seven
description: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
description: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

title: Back to the Future Part III
description: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

title: Terror on the Prairie
description: On the Montana plains, a frontier woman must protect herself against a ruthless gang of outlaws hell-bent on revenge.

title: High Plains Drifter
description: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

title: Hell on Wheels
description: The Civil War is past, but former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon can't put it behind him. Fresh are the memories of the death of his wife, killed at the hands of the Union soldiers, an act that sets him on a course of revenge.

title: Dances with Wolves
description: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Native Americans, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: The Dark Tower
description: A boy haunted by visions of a dark tower from a parallel reality teams up with the tower's disillusioned guardian to stop an evil warlock known as the Man in Black who plans to use the boy to destroy the tower and open the gates of Hell.

title: The Homesman
description: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.

title: Red Dead Redemption II
description: Amidst the decline of the Wild West at the turn of the 20th century, outlaw Arthur Morgan and his gang struggle to cope with the loss of their way of life.

title: Westworld
description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

title: Walker, Texas Ranger
description: Walker and his partner Trivette are Texas Rangers. They make it their business to battle crime in Dallas and all around the Great State of Texas.

title: Rango
description: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

title: Young Guns
description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.

title: Cry Macho
description: A one-time rodeo star and washed-up horse breeder takes a job to bring a man's young son home and away from his alcoholic mom. On their journey, the horseman finds redemption through teaching the boy what it means to be a good man.

title: Rawhide
description: Gil Favor is trail boss of a continuous cattle drive. He is assisted by Rowdy Yates. The crew runs into characters and adventures along the way.

title: Frontier
description: Follows Declan Harp, a half-Irish/half Cree Native-Canadian outlaw who is campaigning to breach the Hudson's Bay Company's monopoly on the fur trade in Canada.

title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
description: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

title: Silverado
description: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

title: Lonesome Dove
description: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and several other residents of a small Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

title: Billy the Kid
description: An epic romantic adventure based on the life of Billy the Kid, from his humble Irish roots and his early days as a cowboy and gunslinger in the American frontier, to his pivotal role in the Lincoln County War and beyond.

title: The Longest Ride
description: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

title: The Mask of Zorro
description: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
description: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

title: A Fistful of Dollars
description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

title: Joe Pickett
description: Follows a game warden and his family during a changing political and socioeconomic climate in a small rural town.

title: Desperado
description: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.

title: Rust
description: A 13-year-old boy left to fend for himself and his younger brother following their parents' deaths in 1880s Kansas goes on the run with his long-estranged grandfather after he's sentenced to hang for the accidental killing of a local rancher.

title: Wynonna Earp
description: Following Wyatt Earp's great great-granddaughter as she battles demons and other creatures. With her unique abilities and a posse of dysfunctional allies, she's the only thing that can bring the paranormal to justice.

title: Maverick
description: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: Forsaken
description: In 1872, an embittered gunslinger named John Henry Clayton attempts to make amends with his estranged father Reverend Samuel Clayton while their community is besieged by ruthless land-grabbers.

title: Django/Zorro
description: Several years after the events of Django Unchained (2012), Django meets Don Diego de la Vega, the famed Zorro, and agrees to become his bodyguard on a mission to free the local aboriginal population from slavery.

title: Cheyenne
description: After the Civil War, nomadic adventurer Cheyenne Bodie roamed the west looking for fights, women, and bad guys to beat up. His job changed from episode to episode.

title: News of the World
description: A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl, taken by the Kiowa people years ago, to her aunt and uncle, against her will. They travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.

title: The Magnificent Seven
description: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

title: McLintock!
description: Wealthy rancher G. W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

title: The Quick and the Dead
description: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

title: Wild Wild West
description: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

title: A Million Ways to Die in the West
description: As a cowardly farmer begins to fall for the mysterious new woman in town, he must put his newly found courage to the test when her husband, a notorious gun-slinger, announces his arrival.

title: My Name Is Nobody
description: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with an old gunfighter who only wants to retire.

title: Butcher's Crossing
description: A frontier epic about an Ivy League drop-out as he travels to the Colorado wilderness, where he joins a team of buffalo hunters on a journey that puts his life and sanity at risk. Based on the highly acclaimed novel by John Williams.

title: Murder at Yellowstone City
description: A former slave arrives in Yellowstone City, Montana, a desolate former boomtown now on the decline, looking for a place to call home. On that same day, a local prospector discovers gold - and is murdered.

title: The Rifleman
description: The adventures of a Wild West rancher, wielding a customized rapid-fire Winchester rifle, and his son.

title: Hang 'Em High
description: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

title: The Wild Wild West
description: Two Secret Service agents, equipped with a wide array of gizmos, work for the government in the Old West.

title: High Noon
description: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

title: For a Few Dollars More
description: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.

title: Three Amigos!
description: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

title: National Treasure 3
description: The plot is unknown at this time.

title: Shane
description: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

title: The Rider
description: After suffering a near fatal head injury, a young cowboy undertakes a search for new identity and what it means to be a man in the heartland of America.

title: The Son
description: A multi-generational epic telling of the story of America's birth as a superpower through the bloody rise and fall of one Texas oil empire.

title: Hell Hole
description: Just outside a desolate ghost town, inside a long-abandoned gold mine, lurks a dark being, conjured by the Shanowah tribe ages ago to destroy those that threatened to wipe out their people. Every one of the descendants of the miners who trapped it inside the Hell Hole mine suffer from schizophrenia. Some say it's because of the family curse. Poni has come down with it...

title: The Ridiculous 6
description: An outlaw who was raised by Native Americans discovers that he has five half-brothers. Together the men go on a mission to find their wayward, deadbeat dad.

title: The Searchers
description: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

title: Open Range
description: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

title: Django
description: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a half-breed prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

title: Joe Kidd
description: An ex-bounty hunter reluctantly helps a wealthy landowner and his henchmen track down a Mexican revolutionary leader.

title: Brimstone
description: From the moment the new Reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows that she and her family are in great danger.

title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
description: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

title: The Wild Bunch
description: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

title: The Lone Ranger
description: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

title: The Wind
description: A plains-woman faces the harshness and isolation of the untamed land in the Western frontier of the late 1800s.

title: The Dressmaker
description: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
description: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

title: True Grit
description: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

title: Young Guns II
description: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.

title: Appaloosa
description: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

title: Dead Man
description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

title: The Last Stand
description: The leader of a drug cartel busts out of a courthouse and speeds to the Mexican border, where the only thing in his path is a sheriff and his inexperienced staff.

title: Giant
description: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

title: Maverick
description: Bret and Bart Maverick are well-dressed gamblers who migrate from town to town always looking for a good game.

title: The Salvation
description: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.

title: Zorro
description: Don Diego de la Vega opposes the corrupt tyrants of Spanish California as the masked swordsman, Zorro.

title: The Lusty Men
description: Retired rodeo champion Jeff McCloud agrees to mentor novice rodeo contestant Wes Merritt against the wishes of Merritt's wife who fears the dangers of this rough sport.

title: That Dirty Black Bag
description: Two men face off in a savage, deserted world.

title: Australia
description: Set in northern Australia before WWII, an Englishwoman who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscapes.

title: Kung Fu
description: The adventures of Shaolin Monk Kwai Chang Caine as he wanders the American West armed only with his skill in Kung Fu.

title: Far and Away
description: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

title: Red Headed Stranger
description: Revisionist western about fallen preacher Shay, who guns down his wife Raysha for running off with another man. Wandering, he meets single mom Laurie. However, helpless sheriff Scoby wants Shay to help him fight the villainous Clavers.

title: The Sisters Brothers
description: Eli and Charlie Sisters, an infamous duo of gunslinging assassins, chase a gold prospector and his unexpected ally in 1850s Oregon.

title: The Legend of Zorro
description: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Don Alejandro de la Vega and his wife, Elena, to take action.

title: Pale Rider
description: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

title: Gun the Man Down
description: Two bank robbers abandon their wounded partner to the posse and run with the loot but their partner, after serving time in prison, seeks revenge.

title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
description: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

title: Jeremiah Johnson
description: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

title: The Misfits
description: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.

title: Horizon
description: Chronicles a multi-faceted, 15-year span of pre-and post-Civil War expansion and settlement of the American west.

title: Rio Bravo
description: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

title: River of No Return
description: The titular river unites a farmer recently released from prison, his young son, and an ambitious saloon singer. In order to survive, each must be purged of anger, and each must learn to understand and care for the others.

title: The Big Valley
description: The Wild West adventures of the Barkley family in California's San Joaquin Valley.

title: Ravenous
description: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

title: The Train Robbers
description: A gunhand named Lane is hired by a widow, Mrs. Lowe, to find gold stolen by her husband so that she may return it and start fresh.

title: The High Chaparral
description: The Cannon family runs the High Chaparral Ranch in the Arizona Territory in 1870s.

title: Tales of Wells Fargo
description: Agent Jim Hardie splits his life between being an agent helping Wells Fargo cope with bad guys, and owning a ranch near San Francisco, California.

title: El Dorado
description: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

title: Heaven's Gate
description: During the Johnson County War in 1890 Wyoming, a sheriff born into wealth does his best to protect immigrant farmers from rich cattle interests.

title: Have Gun - Will Travel
description: The adventures of a gentlemanly gunfighter-for-hire.

title: Deadwood: The Movie
description: As the residents of Deadwood gather to commemorate Dakota's statehood in 1889, saloon owner Al Swearengen and Marshal Seth Bullock clash with Senator George Hearst.

title: Bubba Ho-Tep
description: Elvis Presley and a black "JFK" stay in a nursing home where nothing happens - until a wayward Egyptian mummy comes and sucks out the old people's souls thru their anuses. The two decide to fight back.

title: The Unforgiven
description: The neighbors of a frontier family turn on them when it is suspected that their adopted daughter was stolen from the local Kiowa tribe.

title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
description: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

title: El Topo
description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

title: Resident Evil 4
description: Six years after the events in Raccoon City, Leon Kennedy, now a federal agent, is sent to a rural part of Spain to rescue the U.S. President's kidnapped daughter, Ashley Graham from a sinister cult.

title: Hidalgo
description: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

title: True History of the Kelly Gang
description: Australian bushranger Ned Kelly and his gang flee from authorities during the 1870s.

title: In a Valley of Violence
description: A mysterious stranger and a random act of violence drag a town of misfits and nitwits into the bloody crosshairs of revenge.

title: Paint Your Wagon
description: Two unlikely prospector partners share the same wife in a California gold rush mining town.

title: Daniel Boone
description: Frontier hero Daniel Boone conducts surveys and expeditions around Boonesborough, running into both friendly and hostile Indians, before, during, and even after the Revolutionary War.

title: Golden Kamuy
description: In the early 20th century in Hokkaido, Japan, a treasure hunt between various parties takes place for a hidden stash of gold.

title: Hatfields & McCoys
description: Dramatization of the bitter blood feud between the two families on the West Virginia/Kentucky border in the years after the Civil War.

title: Yellowstone Spinoff, 6666
description: Founded when Comanches still ruled West Texas, no ranch in America is more steeped in the history of the West than the 6666. Still operating as it did two centuries before, and encompassing an entire county, the 6666 is where the rule of law and the laws of nature merge in a place where the most dangerous thing one does is the next thing. The 6666 is synonymous with t...

title: Stagecoach
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

title: The Young Riders
description: The adventures of the riders of the Pony Express.

title: Jonah Hex
description: The U.S. military makes a scarred bounty hunter with warrants on his own head an offer he cannot refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must stop a terrorist who is ready to unleash Hell on Earth.

title: Bacurau
description: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

title: Little Big Man
description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

title: Guns 3: Alias Billy the Kid
description: Plot kept under wraps. Third installment of the 'Young Guns' film franchise.

title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
description: A Civil War veteran with a sawed-off rifle as a holstered weapon makes a living as a bounty hunter in the Wild West of the 1870s.

title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
description: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

title: The Cowboys
description: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

title: The Great Race
description: In the early 20th century, two rivals, the heroic Leslie and the despicable Professor Fate, engage in an epic automobile race from New York to Paris.

title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
description: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

title: Urban Cowboy
description: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

title: Shanghai Noon
description: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

title: Hud
description: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

title: Hombre
description: John Russell, disdained by his "respectable" fellow stagecoach passengers because he was raised by Native Americans, becomes their only hope for survival when they are set upon by outlaws.

title: Around the World in 80 Days
description: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor, beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

title: The Professionals
description: An arrogant Texas millionaire hires four adventurers to rescue his kidnapped wife from a notorious Mexican bandit.

title: The Missing
description: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.

title: How the West Was Won
description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

title: The Gambler
description: The adventures of Brady Hawkes, a gambler on his way to help his young son while also helping another gambler learn to play it right.

title: The Last Manhunt
description: In 1909, amidst the dying old west, Willie Boy, a long distance Desert Runner by Chemehuevi tradition, falls in love with young native beauty, Carlota. Carlota's father, a Chemehuevi shaman and local tribal leader, refuses to let the young couple be together. In a fatal confrontation, Carlota's father falls dead to an accidental gun shot and the young lovers flee to t...

title: 100 Rifles
description: In 1912 Sonora, Mexico, native revolutionary Yaqui Joe (Burt Reynolds) robs a bank to buy arms for his oppressed people, but finds himself sought by an American lawman and the Mexican Army.

title: Rio Lobo
description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the two traitors whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

title: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man
description: Forced by the imminent foreclosure of their friend's bar, two lifelong buddies will decide to rob a bank's armored car, not knowing that its cargo is not money but a new street drug.

title: Oklahoma!
description: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

title: Big Jake
description: In 1909, when John Fain's gang kidnaps Jacob McCandles' grandson and holds him for ransom, Big Jake sets out to rescue the boy.

title: Destry
description: A dishonest mayor and powerful criminal dominate a small western town. But when the town's sheriff dies under mysterious circumstances, Tom Destry, son of a famed gunman, is called in to put an end to the corruption.

title: Old Yeller
description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

title: The Desperadoes
description: A wanted outlaw arrives in town to rob a bank that has already been held up! His past and his friendship with the sheriff land them both in trouble.

title: Nevada Smith
description: A half-American Indian and half-white teenager evolves into a hardened killer as he tracks down his parents' murderers.

title: Into the West
description: Tales from the American West in the 19th century, told from the perspective of two families, one of white settlers and one of Native Americans.

title: Quigley Down Under
description: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

title: The Horse Whisperer
description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

title: The Shootist
description: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

title: Bad Girls
description: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

title: The Man from Snowy River
description: In 1880s Australia, after young Jim Craig's father dies, he takes a job at the Harrison cattle ranch, where he is forced to become a man.

title: Home on the Range
description: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

title: Laramie
description: In the 1870s Wyoming Territory, Slim Sherman and his 14-year-old brother Andy try to hang on to their ranch after their father's death.

title: Django
description: Follows Django, a gunslinger in the Wild West who is searching for his daughter who he believes escaped the murder of his family eight years ago.

title: The Old Way
description: An old gunslinger and his daughter must face the consequences of his past, when the son of a man he murdered years ago arrives to take his revenge.

title: Tremors II: Aftershocks
description: Earl Bassett, now a washed-up ex-celebrity, is hired by a Mexican oil company to eradicate a Graboid epidemic that's killing more people each day. However, the humans aren't the only one with a new battle plan.

title: The Adventures of Brisco County, Jr.
description: A bounty hunter rides the Old West, fighting bad guys, many with futuristic-type gadgets.

title: Hondo
description: Army dispatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

title: They Call Me Trinity
description: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

title: Red River
description: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

title: Bandidas
description: In turn-of-the-century Mexico, two very different women become a bank-robbing duo in an effort to combat a ruthless enforcer terrorizing their town.

title: Hey Dude
description: A group of friends work together with their boss at a dude ranch and go through many fun moments and mishaps along the way.

title: Fort Apache
description: At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.

title: Pure Country
description: Dusty gets tired of all the smoke and light effects, wonders what happened to doing it the way that made him famous and happy. Takes a walk to find what seems to be missing and finds himself and his music again!

title: Warlock
description: A famous gunman becomes the marshal of Warlock to end a gang's rampages, but is met with some opposition by a former gang member turned deputy sheriff who wants to follow only legal methods.

title: Eyes of Fire
description: A preacher is accused of adultery, and he and his followers are chased out of town. They become stranded in an isolated forest, which is haunted by the spirits of long dead Native Americans.

title: Cattle King
description: A rich landowner of Wyoming fights to prevent the Texas herds from trampling his rich meadows.

title: Hostile Territory
description: In post-civil war America, when a Union soldier is presumed dead, his children are mistakenly sent away on the orphan train. This is a wild-west story of people uniting for the greater good, and children forced to grow up quickly.

title: Duck, You Sucker!
description: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

title: Outland
description: A federal marshal stationed at a mining colony on the Jupiter moon of Io uncovers a drug-smuggling conspiracy. He gets no help from the workers or authorities when he finds himself marked for murder.

title: Jane Got a Gun
description: A woman asks her ex-lover for help in order to save her outlaw husband from a gang out to kill him.

title: Woman Walks Ahead
description: Catherine Weldon, a portrait painter from 1890s Brooklyn, travels to Dakota to paint a portrait of Sitting Bull and becomes embroiled in the Lakota peoples' struggle over the rights to their land.

title: The Way West
description: In 1843, a former U.S. Senator leads a wagon train of settlers to Oregon, but his megalomania leads to growing dissatisfaction with his leadership.

title: Damnation
description: An epic saga about the secret history of the 1930s American heartland, centering on the mythic conflict and bloody struggle between big money and the downtrodden.

title: The Last Son
description: An outlaw attempts to end his evil family line.

title: Stage to Chino
description: To investigate a gold-shipping scam, a postal inspector goes undercover and tries to infiltrate the gang he believes is responsible.

title: Fallout: New Vegas
description: After surviving a bullet to the head, Courier Six traverses the post-apocalyptic Mojave desert in search of the men who wronged him, while making an impact on thousands in the process.

title: Slow West
description: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

title: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

title: Buck and the Preacher
description: A wagon master and a con-man preacher help freed slaves dogged by cheap-labor agents out West.

title: Gunfighters
description: Gunfighter Brazos Kane takes a job on a ranch but he is unjustly accused of killing fellow cowhand Bob Tyrell and must clear himself by finding the real killer.

title: The Scarlet Letter
description: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.

title: Extreme Prejudice
description: A Texas Ranger and a ruthless narcotics kingpin - they were childhood friends, now they are adversaries...

title: Lawman
description: This is the story of Marshal Dan Troop of Laramie, Wyoming, and his Deputy Johnny McKay, an orphan Troop took under his wing.

title: The Good Lord Bird
description: Ethan Hawke stars as abolitionist John Brown in this series based on the novel. "Onion" is a fictional enslaved boy who becomes a member of Brown's family of abolitionist soldiers and finds himself in the 1859 raid at Harpers Ferry.

title: Never Grow Old
description: An Irish undertaker profits when outlaws take over a peaceful American frontier town, but his family comes under threat as the death toll rises.

title: How the West Was Won
description: The Macahans, a family from Virginia, headed by Zeb Macahan, travel across the country to pioneer a new land and a new home in the American West.

title: Kenny Rogers as The Gambler: The Adventure Continues
description: Brady Hawkes, Billy Montana, and Jeremiah Hawkes are on a train bound for a huge gambling event when the train is taken over by a gang of vicious killers in search of money. As ransom, the gang takes young Jeremiah hostage. Brady and Billy embark on a quest to rescue him and form a small gang of their own along the way.

title: Red Dead Redemption
description: A former outlaw is forced by the federal government to hunt down the members of his old gang.

title: The Legend of Molly Johnson
description: A lonely bushwoman struggles to raise her children and run the family farm while her husband is away.

title: Tremors 4: The Legend Begins
description: A prequel to Tremors (1990), this movie tells us about how the town of Perfection, Nevada became founded and how they defended it against the Graboids with the help of Burt Gummer's ancestor, Hiram.

title: Tin Man
description: A re-imagining of L. Frank Baum's classic "The Wizard of Oz".

title: Spirit Untamed
description: Lucky Prescott's life is changed forever when she moves from her home in the city to a small frontier town and befriends a wild mustang named Spirit.

title: Free State of Jones
description: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

title: One-Eyed Jacks
description: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured, but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
description: Loosely based on historical fact, the series portrays the gunslinging Wyatt Earp and his successful determination for law and order.

title: The Proposition
description: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

title: Return of the Gunfighter
description: An aging gunman and a wounded drifter come upon a young Mexican girl, and agree to help her avenge the death of her father, who was murdered for their land.

title: The Hero
description: An ailing movie star comes to terms with his past and mortality.

title: Winchester '73
description: A cowboy's obsession with a stolen rifle leads to a bullet-ridden odyssey through the American West.

title: Alias Smith and Jones
description: Hannibal Heyes and Kid Curry, two of the most wanted outlaws in the history of the West, are popular "with everyone except the railroads and the banks".

title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
description: In the old west, a man becomes a Sheriff just for the pay, figuring he can decamp if things get tough. In the end, he uses ingenuity instead.

title: F Troop
description: The misadventures of the staff and neighbors of a remote U.S. Army outpost in the Wild West.

title: Geronimo: An American Legend
description: The story of the Apache chief and his armed resistance to the U.S. Government's subjugation of his people.

title: Texas Rising
description: The story of how the Texas Rangers were created.

title: Mountain Men
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to live your life off the grid? Have you wished you could shed the complications of modern society and live in the wilderness, using only the things nature has provided? Meet Eustace Conway, Tom Oar and Marty Meierotto, three men who have devoted their lives to survival in its simplest form. But how simple is it really? Fro...

title: Chino
description: A runaway teenager and a mixed-race horse breeder strike an unlikely friendship in the context of common hardships.

title: First Cow
description: A skilled cook has traveled west and joined a group of fur trappers in Oregon, though he only finds true connection with a Chinese immigrant also seeking his fortune. Soon the two collaborate on a successful business.

title: Red River
description: A remake of the 1948 movie of the same name. Arness portrayed a rancher at odds with his son.

title: The Kid
description: The story of a young boy who witnesses Billy the Kid's encounter with Sheriff Pat Garrett.

title: Centennial
description: The economic and cultural growth of Colorado spanning two centuries from the mid 1700s to the late 1970s.

title: Cimarron
description: The Oklahoma Land Run of April 1889 sets the stage for an epic saga of a frontier adventurer, his wife and family and their friends.

title: The Big Country
description: A New England sea captain in the 1880s arrives at his fiancée's sprawling Texas ranch, where he becomes embroiled in a feud between two families over a valuable patch of land.

title: Coroner Creek
description: A man is bent on taking revenge on those he believes are responsible for his fiance's death.

title: Zorro
description: In nineteenth century Spanish California, heroic masked swordsman Zorro, who's actually a local nobleman, must protect his friends and small town (or pueblo) of Los Angeles from its corrupt magistrate (or alcalde) and other menaces.

title: The Alamo
description: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

title: Lone Star
description: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

title: Broken Arrow
description: Tom Jeffords tries to make peace between settlers and Apaches in Arizona territory.

title: Stagecoach
description: On the stagecoach to Cheyenne, a mixed group of passengers must work together to survive the arduous journey and the Indian attacks.

title: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
description: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

title: Soldier Blue
description: After a cavalry patrol is ambushed by the Cheyenne, the two survivors, a soldier and a woman, must reach the safety of the nearest fort.

title: Snowy River: The McGregor Saga
description: Inspired by Banjo Paterson's famous poem, The Man from Snowy River, this series is about cattle rancher Matt McGregor, his family, and their neighbours in the township of Paterson's Ridge in Australia's Snowy Mountains.

title: The Long Riders
description: The origins, exploits and the ultimate fate of the Jesse James gang is told in a sympathetic portrayal of the bank robbers made up of brothers who begin their legendary bank raids because of revenge.

title: The Alamo
description: In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.

title: All the Pretty Horses
description: Two Texas cowboys head to Mexico in search of work, but soon find themselves in trouble with the law after one of them falls in love with a wealthy rancher's daughter.

title: Love Me Tender
description: At the end of the Civil War, a Confederate team is ordered to rob a Union payroll train but the war ends leaving these men with their Union loot, until the Feds come looking for it.

title: Gallowwalkers
description: A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.

title: Gunpoint
description: A young, determined sheriff and his posse chase a gang of murderous train robbers, and a kidnapped woman into New Mexico.

title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
description: In Vinegaroon, Texas, former outlaw Roy Bean appoints himself the judge for the region and dispenses his brand of justice as he sees fit.

title: The War Wagon
description: The story of a man who was shot, robbed and imprisoned who returns to steal a large gold shipment from the man who wronged him. The gold is transported in an armored stage coach, the War Wagon.

title: Hell
description: After being deported back to Mexico, a man has no choice but to join the vicious drug cartel that has corrupted his hometown in order to survive.

title: Rustlers' Rhapsody
description: The Wild West goes wacko when the Greatest Fast-Drawin', Fancy-Dressin', Silver-Spurred, Geetar Playin', Singing Cowboy movie matinee idol Rex O'Herlihan hits the saddle in this cockeyed, affectionate send-up of the '40s B-movie Western.

title: The Cowboy Way
description: Two childhood friends who are rodeo cowboys travel from New Mexico to New York City searching for a friend who disappeared while looking for his daughter, who's just been smuggled into the US from Cuba.

title: Here Come the Brides
description: The adventures of a logging work team and the marriageable single women sent to them in post-American Civil War Seattle in the Washington Territory.

title: Deputy
description: Deputy Bill Hollister, a career lawman who is very comfortable kicking down doors but utterly lost in a staff meeting, becomes acting sheriff of Los Angeles County when the sheriff drops dead.

title: Tom and Huck
description: Two best friends witness a murder and embark on a series of adventures in order to prove the innocence of the man wrongly accused of the crime.

title: The Fastest Gun Alive
description: In the western frontier town of Cross Creek, storekeeper George Temple is a polite and soft spoken man with a secret past. When 3 bank robbers on the lam stop in town to change horses, George's past comes back to haunt him.

title: Vegas
description: Ralph Lamb, a former MP for the US Army, becomes sheriff. His brother, Jack, and his son, Dixon, are deputized. Meanwhile, Vincent Savino comes from Chicago to Vegas to run The Savoy hotel and casino.

title: The Life and Times of Grizzly Adams
description: An innocent fugitive from the law lives in the wilderness with a grizzly bear companion and helps passers-by in the forest.

title: The Missouri Breaks
description: Tom Logan is a horse thief. Rancher David Braxton has horses, and a daughter, worth stealing. But Braxton has just hired Lee Clayton, an infamous "regulator", to hunt down the horse thieves; one at a time.

title: The Good the Bad the Weird
description: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

title: Branded
description: In the 1880s Jason McCord travels the country trying to prove he's no coward. He needs to do this because the military career of this West point graduate came to an end when he was thrown out of the army after being accused of cowardice.

title: Cat Ballou
description: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

title: She Wore a Yellow Ribbon
description: Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.

title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
description: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

title: A Man Called Horse
description: In 1825, an English aristocrat is captured by Native Americans. He lives with them and begins to understand their way of life. Eventually, he is accepted as part of the tribe and aspires to become their leader.

title: Rio Grande
description: A cavalry officer posted on the Rio Grande is confronted with murderous raiding Apaches, a son who's a risk-taking recruit and his wife from whom he has been separated for many years.

title: Tombstone Territory
description: Tough Sheriff Clay Hollister keeps the law in Tombstone, Arizona with the support of his faithful deputies and the editor of the local newspaper.

title: Hell on the Border
description: Arkansas, 1875, After shooting 5 men to save a judge and then going into Indian Territory after a lethal outlaw, Bass Reeves becomes the first black deputy marshal west of Mississippi.

title: Mackenna's Gold
description: A bandit kidnaps a Marshal who has seen a map showing a gold vein on Indian lands, but other groups are looking for it too, while the Apache try to keep the secret location undisturbed.

title: Bat Masterson
description: A dressed-up dandy (derby and cane), gambler, and lawman roams the West, charming women and defending the unjustly-accused. His primary weapon is his wit rather than his gun.

title: Coogan's Bluff
description: Arizona Deputy Sheriff Coogan (Clint Eastwood) is sent to New York City to escort an escaped fugitive back for trial.

title: 1883: The Road West
description: A behind-the-scenes look at the making of Taylor Sheridan's highly anticipated Yellowstone prequel, '1883'.

title: The Wild Bunch
description: A gang of American bandits try to elude bounty hunters during the waning days of the wild West. A remake of the 1969 film directed by Sam Peckinpah.

title: The Texican
description: A former Texas sheriff, living in Mexico, goes to Arizona to investigate the murky circumstances under which his brother, a peaceful newspaperman, was killed.

title: The Outlaw
description: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

title: Guns of the Magnificent Seven
description: A Mexican revolutionary hires an American gunslinger to organize the rescue of their leader from a brutal Army prison.

title: The Cimarron Kid
description: Unjustly accused of robbing the train he was riding home, Bill Doolin re-joins his old gang, participates in other robberies and becomes a wanted outlaw.

title: Drums Across the River
description: When whites hunger after the gold on Ute Indian land, a bigoted young man finds himself forced into a peacekeeping role.
